metadata.name: 0 4 Stannous Fluoride Brush On Gel 0 3408 g 284g Concentrate

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Indicated for use to relieve dental hypersensitivity increase enamel production prevent gingivitis and cavities and control periodontal infections

contraindications.disease: The oral LD50 value in rats is 360mg kg and the dermal LD50 value is 2000mg kg Repeated or prolonged dermal contact can cause irritant symptoms such as reddening of the skin blisters or dermatitis
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Stannous fluoride mediates both bactericidal and bacteriostatic properties and provides an anti erosive action on tooth enamel
